debt_section: Total debt: $47,032 million. Senior unsecured notes with interest rates from 2.40% to 4.45%. Maturities: 2024: $5,250M, 2025: $2,750M, 2026: $3,000M, 2027: $8,000M, 2028: $4,500M, Thereafter: $23,532M.
earnings_excerpt: Satya Nadella: Revenue $211.9 billion, up 7%. Cloud revenue $111.6 billion. Amy Hood: Operating income $88.5 billion.
